name: Superior_Attuned_Superior_Sentinels_Ward_F
display_name: Superior Attuned Superior Sentinels Ward F
display_help: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character. Gives the slotted power a chance to generate a moderate absorb buff and reduces the power's recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.RechargeTime.Scale}%. This enhancement's chance to trigger is equal to approximately 2 times per minute. This enhancement can only be slotted by Sentinels and may be slotted into any Sentinel damage power and requires the user to be level 50.
power_display_names: Superior Sentinel's Ward: Recharge/Chance for Absorb
power_short_helps: Increases Attack Rate, Chance for Absorb
